content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Explain one reason that the Nazi German regime undertook the Holocaust against European Jews.
b) Describe one earlier intellectual development that contributed to Nazi ideology.
c) Explain one way in which the Holocaust was similar to actions undertaken under Stalin’s Soviet regime.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
